popup_all_tasks_text: Tasks are performed sequentially, and are locked upon completion.
task_read_introduction_text: TODO This is the introduction text.
task_make_voronoi_points_text: Worlds are generated over a graph of adjacent cells. Cells are determined by using Delaunay triangulation on a list of points to create a Voronoi diagram. Points can be arranged according to several methods.

popup_complete_task_description: Completing this task will lock in the changes you have made to your world.
